nodes.text: The Enlightened Bantha was a flight maneuver used by pilots of the New Republic after the Battle of Endor. Four years after the destruction of Alderaan, pilots of the Temperance battle group were warned to only perform this maneuver in open space, along with the Antilles Intercept and the Dragon Kite.
Enlightened Bantha was first mentioned in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
